title: How to Open Pack a Punch in Tranzit

steps.title: Build the Turbine in the bus station.
steps.content: Build the Turbine in the bus station. Collect all the pieces and assemble them at the workbench. You will need at least one (maybe two. Have another player grab one just in case). [1] X Research source The battery will be near the pay phone. The mannequin will be standing next to the station map. The fan will be on one of the waiting seats.

steps.title: Grab it and leave.
steps.content: Grab it and leave. Either ride the bus to the power station, or teleport there.

steps.title: Open the door to the power station (costs 750 points).
steps.content: Open the door to the power station (costs 750 points). Turn on the power (you can skip this).

steps.title: If you turned on the power, place the Turbine in the front of the hallway you first jump down.
steps.content: If you turned on the power, place the Turbine in the front of the hallway you first jump down. Leave and go straight to the town.

steps.title: If you didn't turn the power on, don't go down.
steps.content: If you didn't turn the power on, don't go down. Place the Turbine at the front of the door leading down, as close as you can get it. Go to town immediately afterwards. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Open the bank in the town.
steps.content: Open the bank in the town. After it is open, open the safe. If the Turbine is still on, the vault will be open.

steps.title: Find the parts.
steps.content: Find the parts. The board, the slot, and the battery. They are scattered inside the vault.

steps.title: Assemble the parts at the workbench in the back of the vault.
steps.content: Assemble the parts at the workbench in the back of the vault. Your end result will be Pack-A-Punch. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Pack-A-Punch your weapon(s) (costs 5000 points).
steps.content: Pack-A-Punch your weapon(s) (costs 5000 points). The power will be amplified, the name will change, and it will be heavily modified. [4] X Research source
